text:
:tada: Hi everyone!
I’m thrilled to introduce Link Checker, a must-have solution for flawless marketing emails, now live on the HubSpot Marketplace! :rocket:
:point_right: What does it do?
Link Checker ensures your HubSpot marketing emails stay consistent and error-free by scanning for broken links and keeping your user experience seamless and reliable.
Check it out here: <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/link-checker-6199073|Link Checker on HubSpot Marketplace>
We’d love your feedback and are here to answer any questions. Thank you! :star2:
